attributes.action: Provide more Amulance Cover in Shetland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Petition To
The Scottish Ambulance Service for
More Ambulance Cover for
Mainland Shetland.
Mainland Shetland Needs Another Ambulance Plus Crews.
Recently there were two accidents at opposite ends of Mainland Shetland.
The ambulance crew could not attend both.
This proves that Mainland Shetland needs more than one Ambulance on duty
We the undersigned petition The Scottish Ambulance Service to provide more
ambulance cover for Mainland Shetland.
